Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 43rd overall pick, by Capital City in 1975...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/11/1976, off Christopher Pearson (PON)...
Injured on 4/27/1977 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 7/7/1977, off Daron Hamlin (LP)...
Drove in 6 runs against West Texas on 8/27/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/1/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $650,000 per year...
